reference.title: DisableIdpAuthentication
reference.shortdesc: You can use the DisableIdpAuthentication method to disable support for authentication using third-party IdPs for the cluster. Once disabled, users authenticated by third party IdPs are no longer able to access the cluster and any active authenticated sessions are invalidated/disconnected. LDAP and cluster admins are able to access the cluster via supported UIs.

section.title: Parameters
section.p: This method has no input parameters.

section.title: Return values
section.p: This method has no return values.
